innhold.avsnitt: You can log in to your personal parental benefit webpage your NAV, and see the status of your case. Here you can also upload any outstanding documents and see an overview of your case.
If you have applied using a printed form, you will be able to see the status of your case here after about ten days.
The processing time is up to 6 weeks. See what the processing time is in your county
You will normally be paid the lump-sum grant one week after your application was approved. The benefit is tax-free. Go to the payment summary to see information about the payment.
